entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
